system.description: An Large hand of shimmering, translucent force appears and interposes itself between you and one opponent you designate. The hand moves to remain between you and the target, blocking its attacks. The hand cannot push the opponent away or grapple it, but it prevents the opponent from moving closer to you. The hand has AC 20, 10 hit points per caster level, and hardness 0. If the hand is destroyed, the spell ends. The hand is 0 ft. thick and has a reach of 10 ft. It is immune to spells that affect only creatures. The hand blocks one opponent you designate and only that opponent; others can attack you normally.
